summary: A young woman is seduced and abandoned by a man who was invited to stay at his home by her father in a stormy night. Noticing that she is pregnant, the girl decides to leave home and start a new life.
cast: Karel Schleichert|Ita Rina|Olaf Fjord|Theodor Pistek|Charlotte Susa|Luigi Serventi|Ladislav H. Struna|Milka Balek-Brodská|Bohumil Kovár|Bedrich Saxl|Vladimír Slavínský|Bronislava Livia|Václav Zichovský|Jirí Hron|Willy Rösner|Emanuel Trojan
title: Erotikon
